scores.reasoning: The text is highly organized with numbered sections, headers, a formal introduction, clear definitions, and a systematic progression through theories and concepts, making it a quintessential example of structured writing.

The text is extremely terse, uses short declarative sentences with no elaboration, no filler, no examples, and packs multiple theories into minimal space—classic compressed/telegram style.

purity_signature_correlation.interpretation: Negative = high-purity texts are closer to their mode centroid (good). Positive = high-purity texts are farther (bad — features not capturing what judge sees).
